name: AVHL
description:
embark on a sky-high action in this visual confusion of two classic NES shooters!

avelly hills skyline (abbreviated AVHL) is a vertical shoot'em up.  starting blue boy, who can fly like an eagle, he embarks on a journey to defeat the munches, a blue sky-eating creatures invading the great sky.

features:

  • Confusing visuals inspired by both TwinBee and Fantasy Zone!
  • BGM/SE made entirely in Gameboy tracker!
  • Simple yet challenging gameplay!

controls:

(this game also supports gamepad input)

WASD/Left Stick to move

Enter/A or B button to shoot

ESC/Select to pause the game

Start button on gamepad starts the game in title screen.
